name: A Virus outdoors
description:
Use the Arrow Keys to control your movement.

Q W and E are your other abilities, where 

Q : desinfects the current location (if you have spray in your inventory)
W : places some toilet paper at the current location (if you have some paper in your inventory)
E : eats some noodles (if you have noodles in your inventory)

Use Toiletpaper to prevent the virus from moving to that location,
though it gets destroyed, at the middle of the day.
Use Desinfection spray to kill any Virus that enters that spot.
Keep your self healthy with regularly eating some noodles.
Try to survive as long as you can.

Tipp: 

- Viruses are most active in the night, while basicly completly frozen in the middle of the day.
- Viruses reproduce exponentialy, the earlier you act, the better.
